attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too long this country has suffered flooding and the government has done nothing about it.

It is time to start building a series of canals that rain water can run off into or be diverted to along which it can then be safely carried to dams, reservoirs  or the ocean.

Protect our towns.  Protect our homes from flood waters.  Act now government and put some serious effort into creating some serious flood defences countrywide.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
